[Portrait]Ninja[Dialog]
My lord, the gate is breached!{END}

[Portrait]Celebrant Bremondt[Dialog]
What!?{END}

There's more. A great number of our
troops have fallen comatose. We know
not why.
We fear them drugged.{END}

Im...impossible! Who-?{END}

Our remaining numbers engage the enemy
at the gate, but these are no common
soldiers.
I-forgive me, my lord, but I do not think
they will be held for long.{END}

[Portrait]Beowulf[Dialog]
Bremondt! I come for Reis. I shall
have her relinquished at once!{END}

B-Beowulf!


N-no! C-come no closer!{END}

K-kill them! Kill them all!


You'll...you'll have whatever reward you wish!
Gil-or...or jewels! Wealth enough to...to last
you all your days!{END}

Reis...you'll soon be safe.{END}

[Portrait]Beowulf[Dialog]
Will you not accept the truth,
Bremondt!?
Reis does not love you, nor ever
will she!{END}

[Portrait]Celebrant Bremondt[Dialog]
N-no! That's...that's not true!
Reis is but deceived!
It is you...your lies that blind her
heart! When you are gone, it will all
be different!
There's...there's naught you can do
that I cannot. I can buy her aught and
all she wishes. She'll want for nothing!{END}

[Portrait]Beowulf[Dialog]
'Tis your mind that is deceived, you
who deceive it!
Love is not a thing for goods or gil
exchanged!

Reis would never open her heart to
a man such as you! My living or dying
plays no part in it!{END}

[Portrait]Celebrant Bremondt[Dialog]
You...you cannot fool me! You do not...
You do not know her as I do!
Reis is mine! My own! I will not
surrender her to you!{END}

Your notion of love is one of control and
possession.

Such a thing is not love!


Reis freely took the curse you meant for
me, though she knew what it might entail.
For her, I would fain do the same.
That is what it means to love. And it is
something you will never know.{END}

No! It is you-you and that vile
tongue! I need only silence it,
and we can live together in bliss!{END}

[Portrait]Celebrant Bremondt[Dialog]
P-power...of the Dark....
Heed my call!{END}

[Portrait]Celebrant Bremondt[Dialog]
Denied earthly pleasure, surely Paradise
as well... But vengeance I shall know!{END}

[Portrait]Celebrant Bremondt[Dialog]
Ungaaah!{END}

Reis...is...mine...{END}

[Portrait]Beowulf[Dialog]
Reis belongs to no one.{END}

[Portrait]Beowulf[Dialog]
Reis... I...I've failed you...{END}
